external_references.source_name: Zscaler PAKLOG CorkLog SplatCloak Splatdropper April 2025
external_references.description: Sudeep Singh. (2025, April 16). Latest Mustang Panda Arsenal: PAKLOG, CorKLOG, and SplatCloak | P2. Retrieved September 12, 2025.

objects.description: [CorKLOG](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1235) has achieved persistence through the creation of a scheduled task named TableInputServices by using the command `schtasks /create /tn TabletlnputServices /tr /sc minute /mo 10 /f`.(Citation: Zscaler PAKLOG CorkLog SplatCloak Splatdropper April 2025)
